casebody.data:
In the Matter of PURPORTED WILL OF BARNES. No. 262A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2004. Danny D. McNally, Greenville, Emma S. Holscher, for Riley S. Corddry (Heir at Law). Myron T. Hill, Jr., Greenville, for Diane Graue (Heir at Law). Stephen A. Dunn, Raleigh, Raymond E. Dunn, Jr., New Bern, for Lucy Tull (Heir at Law). Ted Mackall, Jr., Rebecca Cameron Blount, for Caveators, Beneficiaries of the 1967 Will of Francis M. Barnes. John Walter Bryant, Raleigh, Jeffrey A. Batts, Rocky Mount, for Propounders of 1989 Will. Joseph L. Bell, Jr., Rocky Mount, Wendy P. Wilson, for Propounders of 1989 Will of Estate of Francis M. Barns. Gregory S. Camp, Rocky Mount, for Church of the Advent. Charles J. Murray, Special Deputy Attorney General, for ECU Athletic Fund.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of February 2004 by Caveator-Appellants for Additional Time for Oral Argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2004."
